response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents an excellent value considering its market worth and the benefits it offers. I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
